text: Ic<../images/etail.gif>lfred dux hatu writan & cyðan an ðissum gewrite<../images/etail.gif>lfrede regi & allum his weotum & geweotan, & ec swylce minum megum & minum gefeorum, þa m<../images/etail.gif>n þe ic mines<../images/etail.gif>rfes & mines boclondes seolest onn, ð<../images/etail.gif>t is þonne Werburg min wif & uncer gemene bearn.

Þæt is þonne et<../images/etail.gif>restan an Sondenstede & on Selesdune XXXII hida & on Westarham XX hida & on Cloppaham XXX hida & on Leangafelda VI hida & on Horsal<../images/etail.gif>ge X hida & on Netelamstyde VI hida.
Ic<../images/etail.gif>lfred dux sello Werburge & Alhdryðe uncum gemenum bearne, æfter minum dege, þas lond mid cwice<../images/etail.gif>rfe & mid earðe & mid allum ðingum ðe to londum belimpað.
& twa þusendu swina ic heom sello mid þem londum, gif hio hio gehaldeð mid þare cl<../images/etail.gif>nnisse þe uncer wordgecweodu seondan.
& hio gebrenge<../images/etail.gif>t Sancte Petre min twa wergeld, gif ðet Godes willa seo þ<../images/etail.gif>t heo þæt f<../images/etail.gif>reld age.
Ond<../images/etail.gif>fter Werburge d<../images/etail.gif>ge seo Alhðryðe þa lond unbefliten on Sondemstyde & on Selesdune & on Leangafelda.
Ond gif heo bearn h<../images/etail.gif>bbe, feo ð<../images/etail.gif>t bearn to ð<../images/etail.gif>m londum<../images/etail.gif>fter hire.
Gif heo bearn n<../images/etail.gif>bbe, feo ðonne an hire rehtf<../images/etail.gif>deren sio neste hond to þem londe ond to ðem<../images/etail.gif>rfe.

& swa hwylc minra f<../images/etail.gif>drenmega swa ð<../images/etail.gif>t sio þæt hine to ðan gehagige þæt he þa oðoro lond begeotan m<../images/etail.gif>ge & wille, þonne gebygcge he þa lond<../images/etail.gif>t hire mid halfe weorðe.

Ond swe hwylc mon swa ð<../images/etail.gif>t sio þ<../images/etail.gif>t ðes londes bruce ofer minne d<../images/etail.gif>g on Cloppaham, þanne geselle he CC peninga<../images/etail.gif>ghwylce gere to Ceortesege for<../images/etail-uppercase.gif>lfredes sawle to feormfultume.
Ond ic sello<../images/etail.gif>ðelwalde minum sunu III hida boclondes, II hida on Hw<../images/etail.gif>tedune, anes hides an Gatatune, & him sello þerto C swina.
& gif se cyning him geunnan wille þ<../images/etail.gif>s folclondes to ð<../images/etail.gif>m boclonde, þonne h<../images/etail.gif>bbe he & bruce.
Gif hit þ<../images/etail.gif>t ne sio, þonne selle hio him swa hwaðer swa hio wille, swa ð<../images/etail.gif>t lond an Horsalege, swa ð<../images/etail.gif>t an Leangafelda.
Ond ic sello Berhtsige minum mege an hide boclondes on L<../images/etail.gif>ncanfelda & þerto C swina.

& geselle hio C swina to Cristes cirican for me & fer mine sawle, & C to Ceortesege & þone ofer<../images/etail.gif>can mon ged<../images/etail.gif>le gind mynsterhamas to Godes ciricum in Suþregum & in C<../images/etail.gif>nt þa hwile þe hio lestan will<../images/etail.gif>n.
Ond ic sello Sigewulfe minum mege ofer Werburge d<../images/etail.gif>g þ<../images/etail.gif>t lond an Netelhæmstyde.

Ond Sigulf geselle of ðem londe C p<../images/etail.gif>ninga to Cristes cirican ond eghwylc þara<../images/etail.gif>rfewearda þe<../images/etail.gif>fter him to ð<../images/etail.gif>m londe foe, þonne ageofen hio þa ilcan elmessan to Cristes cirican for<../images/etail.gif>lfredes sawle, þa hwile þe fulwiht sio, & hit man on ð<../images/etail.gif>m londe begeotan mege.
Ond ic sello Eadrede minum mege þet lond on Fearnlege<../images/etail.gif>fter Eðelredes d<../images/etail.gif>ge, gif he hit to him geearnian wile.
& he geselle of ðem londe XXX <ombras> cornes<../images/etail.gif>ghwelce gere to Hrofescestre.
Ond sio ðis lond gewriten & unbefliten<../images/etail.gif>fter Eadredes dege in Aelfredes rehtmeodrencynn ða hwile þe fulwihte sio on Angelcynnes ealonde.
Ðeos foresprec & þas gewriotu þe herbeufan awreotene stondað, ic ælfred willio & wille þæt hio sion soðf<../images/etail.gif>stlice forðweard getrymed me & minum<../images/etail.gif>rfeweardum.

Gif ð<../images/etail.gif>t ðonne God ællm<../images/etail.gif>htig geteod habbe ond me þ<../images/etail.gif>t on lene gelið þ<../images/etail.gif>t me gesibbra<../images/etail.gif>rfeweard forð cymeð wepnedhades & ac<../images/etail.gif>nned weorðeð, ðanne ann ic ð<../images/etail.gif>m ofer minne d<../images/etail.gif>g alles mines<../images/etail.gif>rfes to brucenne swa him leofust sio.

And swa hwylc mon swa ðas god & þas geofe & þas gewrioto & þas word mid rehte haldan wille ond gel<../images/etail.gif>stan, gehalde hine heofones cyning in þissum life ondwardum & eac swa in þ<../images/etail.gif>m towardan life.
Ond swa hwylc mon swa hio wonie & breoce, gewonie him God almahtig his weorldare ond eac swa his sawle are in eona eonum.
Her sindon ðæra manna naman awritene ðe ðeosse wisan geweotan sindon.
Ic æðered arcebisceop mid ðære halgan Cristes rodetacne ðas word & ðas wisan f<../images/etail.gif>stnie & write.
Þis is<../images/etail.gif>lfredes<../images/etail.gif>rfegewrit.
